_source.short_desc: Designed around the estimate lifecycle we offer solutions for the pre-construction, procurement and construction stages.
_source.long_desc: Designed by experienced industry professionals, The EDGE is the most effective takeoff to estimate solution in the industry. Not only is The EDGE customized to your trade, but also to your business, so that your takeoff sources the exact materials and manufacturers that your company utilizes. With training to build the databases you need and the best customer service in the business, the EDGE caters to you. Stay ahead of the competition. Wouldn?t you rather bid with The EDGE than against it?
_source.target_audience: Specialty Commercial contractors in the Roofing, Fireproofing, Drywall and Acoustical Tile industries, across the US and Canada. The EDGE customers have an annual revenue range of $2 million and up.

category_features.name: 3D Imaging
category_features.definition: Representation of any object in 3D

category_features.name: Assembly Takeoff
category_features.definition: Estimate project costs based on groups of items and procedures

category_features.name: Electronic Plans
category_features.definition: Create and store all design plans electronically

category_features.name: Issue Management
category_features.definition: Identify and respond to unexpected problems or failures (ie. "negative events")

category_features.name: Subcontractor Management
category_features.definition: Track information, qualifications, and contact details of subcontractors

category_features.name: Accounting Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with a third party accounting system

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.name: Electrical Estimating
category_features.definition: Software designed for electrical businesses

category_features.name: HVAC Estimating
category_features.definition: Software designed for HVAC businesses

category_features.name: Historical Database
category_features.definition: Archive of job costs for similar projects

category_features.name: Plumbing Estimating
category_features.definition: Software designed for plumbing companies

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Subcontractor Management
category_features.definition: Track information, qualifications, and contact details of subcontractors

category_features.name: Takeoff
category_features.definition: Measure digital plans to calculate labor and materials needed

category_features.name: What-if Analysis
category_features.definition: Provides varying estimates based on different scenarios

category_features.name: Aerial Measurement
category_features.definition: Take aerial view measurements of properties and create estimates using tools like Google Maps, etc.

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Commercial
category_features.definition: Specialized for organizations who focus on commercial (ie. office buildings) construction projects

category_features.name: Dispatch Management
category_features.definition: Manage sending personnel and resources to a site as needed

category_features.name: Inspection Management
category_features.definition: Create checklists and to-do lists that can be marked during inspection

category_features.name: Photo Capture
category_features.definition: Take and upload photos from a job and add comments/mark-ups and share with staff, customers, and other contractors

category_features.name: Quotes/Estimates
category_features.definition: Generate quotes and estimates forms to send to customers

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Work Order Management
category_features.definition: Create work orders and track their status to completion

related_products.short_desc: Procore construction management software handles construction projects, resources, people, and financials from planning to closeout.
related_products.features: Procore construction software manages your construction projects, resources and financials from planning to closeout. The platform connects every project contributor to solutions built specifically for the industry for the owner, the general contractor and the specialty contractor. The ability to communicate across teams makes it easier to work together by establishing a single source of truth. This is how Procore gives your team easy access to everything they need to know to get the job done.

related_products.short_desc: Empower estimators to make fast, accurate takeoffs by combining 2D and 3D takeoffs in a single cloud-based environment.
related_products.features: Win more work and reduce project risk with accurate estimates. Deliver competitive bids by easily creating accurate 2D and 3D takeoffs from a single solution. Generate automated quantities from 3D models and get a single inventory of 2D and 3D quantities throughout the takeoff process. Collaborate easily within the estimating department and with other construction teams by working on a single cloud-based environment.

related_products.short_desc: Bid & Win More Profitable Work in Less Time with STACK! Cloud-based, Free Support/Training. Create Your Free Account Today!
related_products.features:
Bid & Win More Profitable Work in Less Time with STACK! 

STACK empowers your team to quickly and accurately measure digital plans, quantify materials and collaborate with key project stakeholders. Our easy-to-use, cloud-based software will help you to ensure takeoff accuracy, eliminate costly bid errors and win more profitable work. 

Create Your Free Account Today!

related_products.short_desc: Construction and real estate management solution that pulls everything together for streamlined, single-source control.
related_products.features: Provides construction and real estate firms with the most complete solution for managing the entire project or property lifecycle with confidence, precision, and efficiency. Formerly Sage Timberline Office.

related_products.short_desc: Houzz Pro is the #1 business management and marketing software for residential contractors and design professionals.
related_products.features: Houzz Pro is the #1 business software for residential contractors & design professionals. Get an all-in-one solution that spans the full customer lifecycle, including marketing, CRM, estimates, takeoffs, 3D floor plans, project management, collaboration, online invoicing & payments, QuickBooks integration, and a client portal. Start a free trial today to see why thousands of Pros trust Houzz Pro to grow & manage their business. Plans are available for all business sizes starting at $49/month.

related_products.short_desc: Digital plan management takeoff & quantity estimating software for the residential and commercial construction industry.
related_products.features:
With PlanSwifts visual point-and-click interface, users can drag and drop individual parts or assemblies directly onto a digitized blueprint to gather quantity Takeoffs and begin the estimating process. Measure linears, unit counts, square footage, pitches and angles in seconds with just a click. PlanSwift calculates the takeoffs automatically - saving users valuable time and effort when they bid jobs.

Pricing is just $1,595.00 for a lifetime license of PlanSwift, including phone support!

related_products.short_desc: On-Screen Takeoff helps you swiftly drag-and-drop takeoffs to reduce costs and improve accuracy to bid and win more work in less time.
related_products.features: With On-Screen Takeoff, you'll generate faster, more accurate takeoffs to bid and win more projects in less time. The industry's leading takeoff solution, OST streamlines your takeoff process by completing measurements and calculations as you mark-up your drawings. When comparing two versions of a drawing, deleted items are in red and added items are in blue. You'll reduce errors and rework and get a head start on your next bid.

related_products.short_desc: True automated takeoff software that actually works. Save time, money and increase accuracy. Start your FREE TRIAL today.
related_products.features:
Countfire is the simple to use automated takeoff software purpose-built for electrical estimators. Count up to 10X faster as you count a symbol once and let Countfire take care of the rest. Start your FREE TRIAL today. 

Enjoy:
Automatic Excel spreadsheet creation
Automatic counting across multiple PDFs
Automatic breakdown of quantities into areas
Record drawings and accuracy reports

PLUS:
No credit card needed.
Cancel anytime.

related_products.short_desc: Measure Square offers a complete suite of measure estimating software solutions across various flooring and other construction trades
related_products.features: Measure Square is transforming the way flooring companies do business, with thousands of customers like Daltile and Sherwin Williams.  Our software enables organizations of every size to easily measure (with laser meters) and design floor plans.  There is also the ability to create professional estimates, even getting signatures on the spot.  The bottom line is that Measure Square greatly improves close rates and profitability.

related_products.short_desc: Field data collection made easy. Draw, markup, collaborate with precision & clarity. All with extreme ease of use.Turn drawings into cu
related_products.features: Our intuitive takeoff tool provides accurate pricing and proposals with professional results through drawing a picture. Never miss any critical data in the field, eliminate time spent calculating quantities of materials with a  50% faster turnaround, and share accurate and easy-to-read drawings with your team.

similar_products.short_desc: Square Takeoff is a 100% cloud-based takeoff and estimating solution for small to medium-sized subcontractors, builders, and suppliers.
similar_products.features: Square Takeoff is a 100% cloud-based takeoff and estimating solution for small- to medium-sized subcontractors, builders, and suppliers for residential or commercial needs. From general contracting to plumbing, we support any trade on PC/iOS or mobile devices. Upload digital blueprints and share or make changes to the job from anywhere. Manage your project bids, calculate square footage, materials, and labor, and set notifications and reminders for smooth project collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: Procore construction management software handles construction projects, resources, people, and financials from planning to closeout.
similar_products.features: Procore construction software manages your construction projects, resources and financials from planning to closeout. The platform connects every project contributor to solutions built specifically for the industry for the owner, the general contractor and the specialty contractor. The ability to communicate across teams makes it easier to work together by establishing a single source of truth. This is how Procore gives your team easy access to everything they need to know to get the job done.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based takeoff and enhancement design software crafted specifically for landscape and irrigation contractors.
similar_products.features: Cloud-based takeoff and enhancement design software crafted specifically for landscape and irrigation contractors. Upload you landscape plan PDFs or use aerial imagery to count objects, measure area, volumes and distances, or layout irrigation heads and plant material. Unlimited storage and cloud technology means you can access all your projects  anytime and from anywhere.

similar_products.short_desc: Trimble Accubid Anywhere is an easy to manage Estimating, Change Management, and Pricing solution hosted in the cloud.
similar_products.features: Trimble Accubid Anywhere is the first of its kind, a fully hosted, hassle-free IT experience. Connect from anywhere at any time, allowing you to focus on what you do best, win work! Updates to takeoffs are viewed in real time, allowing you to verify results immediately. A job consolidated bill of material and closeout screens can be viewed and edited, without having to run a report. Additionally, data validation instantly informs you of any issues or conflicts in a takeoff.

similar_products.short_desc: PrebuiltML is the only intelligent takeoff software available that can produce jobsite ready takeoffs for you today.
similar_products.features: PrebuiltML is takeoff software that can produce jobsite material lists.  It starts with an on-screen digitizer to capture counts, LF, and SF - all with no printed plan set required. PrebuiltML then takes this technology to the NEXT LEVEL with an extensive product database, a profile management tool, and a custom list structure.  Together, these tools let you create a list of materials in your preferred format and products.  And this is just the BEGINNING of this intelligent takeoff software.

similar_products.short_desc: Buildxact is a simple, online estimating and project management tool for builders that allows you to takeoff quickly & easily.
similar_products.features: Buildxact is an easy-to-use construction takeoff software uniquely designed for small builders & trades. With Buildxact, you can do takeoffs up to 80% faster. No more paper plans and scale rulers - upload the PDF and do your takeoff on-screen in minutes. Measure in a few clicks and price jobs in one step with takeoffs automatically linked to item costs. Use and re-use your measurements. Do a takeoff once and have the measurement available to estimate other items.

similar_products.short_desc: Simple, affordable and powerful takeoff and estimating software for the construction industry.
similar_products.features:
Thanks to its inherent simplicity, Active Takeoff will instantly boost your productivity on all your takeoff and estimating jobs. Even if you've never used a computer before! 

Stop spending countless hours measuring your paper plans manually and get more accurate results at the fraction of the time it used to take.

No incompatible scales. Supports Imperial or Metric systems.

Thousands of users are already using Active Takeoff, and they love it!

similar_products.short_desc: InSite Elevation is a PDF & CAD earthwork takeoff and GPS modeling software solution. Bid on more projects in less time. Easy-to-use.
similar_products.features:
InSite Elevation is an earthwork take-off and GPS modeling solution that is easy-to-use so you can work faster, save time, and win more bids.
 
Quickly and accurately calculate cut and fill, stripping, strata quantities, paving and concrete materials, topsoil re-spread, areas, lengths, trench excavation, and backfill.
 
The software also includes GPS machine control systems surface export and generates construction staking data. Training and technical support is included with purchase.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Estimating software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Estimating tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction estimating software enables contractors and builders to accurately estimate project costs. Construction cost estimation software is used by home builders, contractors, and architects to effectively manage construction budgets. Also, construction cost estimating software is common with interior and landscape designers to quickly and efficiently produce accurate and competitively-priced proposals to potential customers. Contractor estimating software also offers features such as job and sub-contractor scheduling, blueprint scanning and auto-updating materials pricing databases. Construction Estimating software is related to Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction CRM software and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction management and construction project management software coordinates business processes for contractors and builders. Organizations use construction management systems to enable collaborative workflow and data access, integrating multiple teams and office locations into a shared work environment. These building software solutions also provide scheduling and real time completion data, including: monitoring of product status, start and finish dates, budgets and expenditures. They also typically offer tools for data organization and presentation, such as construction templates. Construction Management software is related to Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction CRM software and Construction Estimating software.

related_categories.description: Job Costing software is designed to help businesses forecast and maintain records of project costs.
